## ThirdwebSDK.getSignatureDrop() method

Get an instance of a SignatureDrop contract

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

| Parameter       | Type   | Description                          |
| --------------- | ------ | ------------------------------------ |
| contractAddress | string | the address of the deployed contract |
